name: slashmd-monorepo
description: SlashMD - Notion-like Markdown editor for VS Code

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:integration
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/md-mapper && npm run build --workspace=packages/webview-ui && npm run build --workspace=packages/extension-host
scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=packages/md-mapper & npm run dev --workspace=packages/webview-ui & npm run dev --workspace=packages/extension-host
scripts.package: npm run build && cd packages/extension-host && npm run package

author: SlashMD Team
